name: Classes
description: Mission Bit offers semester-long after-school coding courses and summer coding bootcamps for high school students. Students will learn 60-75 hours of project-based coding, go on field trips to tech companies, and have the chance to present their projects at the culminating event, Demo Day! Classes are free and take place in person at local high schools and also online on Zoom.
